mapper.update: update USER_INFO_TB set USER_PW = #{userPW}, USER_NICKNAME = #{userNickname}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_BIRTH = #{userBirth}, USER_ADDRESS = #{userAddress}, USER_ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{userAddressDetail}, USER_GENDER = #{userGender}, USER_POSTAL = #{userPostal}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_ROLE = #{userRole} where USER_ID = #{userID}
mapper.select: SELECT PI.USER_INDEX, GI.GAME_NAME, GI.GAME_IMAGE_LOCATION, UGP.USERGAMEPLAY_TOTAL_PLAY_TIME, GC.GAME_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PAYMENT_INFO_TB PI LEFT JOIN USER_GAME_PLAY_TB UGP ON PI.USER_INDEX = UGP.USER_INDEX AND PI.GAME_INDEX = UGP.GAME_INDEX LEFT JOIN GAME_INFO_TB GI ON PI.GAME_INDEX = GI.GAME_INDEX LEFT JOIN GAME_CATEGORY_LINK_TB GCL ON PI.GAME_INDEX = GCL.GAME_INDEX LEFT JOIN GAME_CATEGORY_TB GC ON GCL.GAME_CATEGORY_ID = GC.GAME_CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN USER_INFO_TB UI ON PI.USER_INDEX = UI.USER_INDEX WHERE UI.USER_ID = #{userID} GROUP BY PI.USER_INDEX, PI.GAME_INDEX, GI.GAME_NAME, GC.GAME_CATEGORY_NAME;
